## Properties

| Property                 | Attribute    | Description                        | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------------ | ------------ | ---------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `apiHost` _(required)_   | `api-host`   | The Host of the API                | `string` | `undefined` |
| `userToken` _(required)_ | `user-token` | The statisticsToken of the ApiUser | `string` | `undefined` |
